statements: UPDATE experimental_data SET experiment_name = 'Experiment A', data_value = 25.6 WHERE id = 1

UPDATE experimental_data SET data_value = 15.25, test_group = 'B' WHERE id = 1

UPDATE ab_testing SET test_results = 0.25, test_group = 'B' WHERE test_id = 2;

UPDATE ab_testing SET test_results=0.75 WHERE test_id=2;
UPDATE experiment_data SET experimental_data = '{"data": "updated data"}', experiment_name = 'experiment A' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE ab_testing SET test_results = '{"result": "successful"}', test_variant = 'Variant B' WHERE ab_test_id = 3;
UPDATE experiment_data SET experimental_data = '{"result": 0.25, "significant": true}' WHERE id = 101;
UPDATE hypothesis_testing SET test_results = '{"p_value": 0.032, "confidence_interval": [0.2, 0.4]}' WHERE test_id = 201;
UPDATE Experiment1 SET experiment_date = '2022-09-30' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE Experiment2 SET experiment_result = 'Success' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE Experiment1 SET experiment_name = 'New Experiment1 Name', experiment_date = '2022-09-01' WHERE id = 1;

UPDATE hypothesis_testing_data SET experiment_name='Experiment A', experiment_description='Description for Experiment A' WHERE experiment_id=1;
UPDATE ab_testing_data SET test_description='New description for Test X', test_name='Test X' WHERE test_id=2;
